author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

When specifying `delayReadingEventProducts == False` in PoolSource this now uses TTree::GetEntry when reading all the data products. This allows ROOT to use implicit multi-threading to decompress multiple TBranches concurrently.


#### PR validation:

This was tested against an actual low efficiency AOD to MiniAOD production job. CPU and number of IO operation measurements show this change to be a substantial improvement over the original implementation of `delayReadingEventProducts == False`.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1380
title: Allow use of TTree::GetEntry in PoolSource
